page.topic: Placing Check boxes, Radio Buttons, and Lists

section.description: A check box, radio button, list, or edit combo box is a variation of a type-in control that is bound to a table field. In each case the user has the option of selecting from two or more pre-defined values. In the case of an edit combo box, the user can also enter a new value.

case.description: 1. If you do not see the Toolbox, select View > Toolbox.
2. To put a check box on the form, select the Check box tool on the Toolbox.
3. To place a radio button, select the Radio Button tool on the Toolbox.
4. While holding down the left mouse button, draw a rectangle on the form.
5. Select the field or variable that will correspond to this new control.
